name: ssh-node-logger
description: A logger utility that can be switched between development and production modes, featuring built-in log rotation, colorized output, multiple log levels, and caching.

scripts.release:patch: npm run release -- --release-as patch && npm run release:push
scripts.release:minor: npm run release -- --release-as minor && npm run release:push
scripts.release:major: npm run release -- --release-as major && npm run release:push

author: ssh-tech
